definition: (TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm
erhua variant of 痰盂[tan2 yu2]
fish brings heat, meat brings phlegm, vegetables and tofu keep you healthy
pinyin: yu2 sheng1 huo3 , rou4 sheng1 tan2 , qing1 cai4 dou4 fu5 bao3 ping2 an1
containing_words.word: 鱼生火，肉生痰，青菜豆腐保平安

sentences.english: A non-productive cough does not expel sputum from the respiratory tract.
sentences.chinese: 干咳指不从呼吸道排出痰液的咳嗽。

sentences.english: Is the phlegm thin and white?
sentences.chinese: 他咳吐的痰是稀白的么？

sentences.english: It is indicated that childhood asthma should be treated through phlegm and blood-stasis.
sentences.chinese: 小儿哮喘应从痰瘀论治，以化痰通瘀为治则。

sentences.english: It is mainly used to cure Hyperlipemia caused by block of blood and phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 主要用于治疗痰湿血瘀型高脂血症。

sentences.english: Persistent hoarseness, dry cough, blood in phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 持续性嘶哑，干咳，痰中带血。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Orange-red cough particles has significant anti-inflammatory effects.
sentences.chinese: 结论橘红痰咳颗粒具有明显抗炎作用。

sentences.english: Sputum smears of patients can be difficult Kechu aerosol inhalation.
sentences.chinese: 对痰粘稠难以咳出的病人可做雾化吸入。

sentences.english: He has been coughing up rusty or GREenish-yellow phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 他咳嗽，并带有绿黄色的痰。

sentences.english: The sputum acid-fast stain showed positive (one plus) and the culture yielded nontuberculous mycobacterium.
sentences.chinese: 痰液抗酸性涂片为阳性且培养结果为非结核分枝杆菌。

sentences.english: Phlegm basic theories of Chinese medicine physical theory is an important part.
sentences.chinese: 痰湿体质学说是中医基础理论的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Culture of the sputum showed growth of Streptococcus pneumoniae.
sentences.chinese: 痰培养肺炎双球菌生长。

sentences.english: "Dan Brook Heart Law" thought that the blood deficiency and related debilities and the asthma are the palpitation pathogenesis basic reasons.
sentences.chinese: 《丹溪心法》认为血虚和痰火是怔忡致病的根本原因。

sentences.english: Soon, he found blood in his saliva.
sentences.chinese: 不久，他在痰中发现了血。

sentences.english: To observe the cure effect of Tanreqing Injection on children hand-foot-mouth disease.
sentences.chinese: 观察痰热清注射液治疗儿童手足口病的疗效。

sentences.english: Left dry throat pain, cough, sputum color white yellow.
sentences.chinese: 咽喉左侧干疼，伴有咳嗽，白黄相间色痰。

sentences.english: I have a persistent cough. I cough up a lot of phlegm(thick spit)on most days.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地在咳，多半时间咳出浓浓的痰。

definition: clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
bodily fluids (general term in Chinese medicine)
